content: I want to have a ProgressUnknown and a ProgressThresh at the same time. I know that ProgressThresh takes the keyword argument offset, but it still doesn't display, even if I set the offset to 20. Am I missing something? The output of stream of my ProgressUnknown is default stderr

hm I'd actually need this. The inner computation is one arc length solver step and for a pretty simple material model the printing is omitted. Even though the printing would affect the performance I wouldn't care at all if I can observe the progress of the iterations.
